text: Joseph Wright (born 25 August 1972) is an English movie director. He is known for his works Pride & Prejudice (2005) and Anna Karenina (2012), the romantic war drama Atonement (2007), the action thriller Hanna (2011), Peter Pan origin story Pan (2015), and Darkest Hour (2017). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:English television directors Category:Movie directors from London
title: Joe Wright
